caption.center: Bennie Jay Eatmon; Bennie Jay Eatmon d/b/a/ Bob's Self Service v.
Town of Bailey, Robert Frazier, Mayor, Individually, Shelly Carroll,
Individually, Judy Rodgers, Commissioner, Individually, Frank Taylor,
Commissioner, Individually, Becky Smith, Town Clerk, Individually,
J. T. Worrell, Chief of Police, Individually, Mark Outerhout,
Attorney, JOhn Doe and Jane Doe, Unknown.

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 18th day of December 2003 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:
Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of February 2004.
